column4: evening all, i'm running running ubuntu-server 8.10 and i want to add an additional hard drive for my home network. The hd is formated as ntfs, and i would like to have it as read & write accessible. how can i get ubu-server to allow this?
is the HD hooked up already?
did you try mounting the HD?
sudo mount /dev/sdb says, mount: can't find /dev/sdb in /etc/fstab or /etc/mtab
im not sure how. google it
try to mount it with gparted
Gparted says: (gpartedbin:5369): Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open display:
